title: Add migration guide for deprecated SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg
body:
`SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg` was removed from this repository and is incompatible with .NET 9+ due to breaking API changes in SkiaSharp (specifically `SKMatrix.MakeTranslation` removal). Users encounter `MissingMethodException` at runtime when attempting to load SVG files.

## Changes

- **Created migration guide** (`docs/docs/svg-migration.md`)
  - Migration steps from `SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg` to `Svg.Skia`
  - Code examples showing namespace change and API compatibility
  - Common error scenarios and solutions

- **Added deprecation notices**
  - README.md with migration guide link
  - Documentation index with prominent warning
  - TOC entry under "Migration Guides"

## Migration Path

The fix is straightforward - `Svg.Skia` maintains API compatibility:

```csharp
// Before (deprecated)
using SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg;

// After (maintained)
using Svg.Skia;

// API remains the same
var svg = new SKSvg();
svg.Load(stream);
canvas.DrawPicture(svg.Picture);
```

No code changes to the repository - documentation only to guide users to the actively maintained alternative.
